content.html: I would just like to note that if it wasn't for FB's buying spree, Facebook would be down, but WhatsApp and Oculus services would be up right now. To say nothing of Instagram Network resiliency is downstream from antitrust enforcement
content.value:
I would just like to note that if it wasn't for FB's buying spree, Facebook would be down, but WhatsApp and Oculus services would be up right now. To say nothing of  Instagram

Network resiliency is downstream from antitrust enforcement
